caption: LA Hacks 2024 - Healthcare Track Winner
displayDescription: pill.ai is an AI-powered platform that prevents prescription errors by verifying medication images and doctor-patient audio using Google's Gemini API. It empowers patients to take charge of their medication with a user-friendly dashboard, enhancing medication safety.

caption: TreeHacks 2025
displayDescription: JARVIS Health is a tablet application designed to monitor soldiers' health during training. It aggregates heart rate and exertion data from wearable devices via the Terra API, providing commanders with a real-time overview of multiple soldiers' physical states. The platform uses OpenAI's GPT-4 models to analyze data and offer actionable insights, supporting data-driven decisions for safer and more effective training.

caption: My Journey in Software Development
displayDescription: This website highlights my experiences, projects, and continuous growth as I explore new opportunities and build new things.

caption: UCLA CS35L Final Project
displayDescription: Built with the PERN stack, this full stack web application helps users manage tasks effectively. It features an interactive drag-and-drop task list, a friends system, and dynamic search filters, making task management intuitive, collaborative, and efficient.
